org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman

Class Helix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman.Helix

  • class Helix
extends Object
    This is for stand-alone testing only and is not part of the Kalman fitting code. Create a simple helix oriented along the B field axis for testing the Kalman fit.
